creator: dolphinling@delphiforums.com
text:
In the icons directory (on my computer: /var/www/localhost/icons), the hand
icons have six fingers (or seven, depending on how you look at it).

This affects hand.right.png, hand.right.gif, hand.up.gif, and hand.up.png. 

This was originally reported to mozilla.org as
https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=254546

I hope I got the component right, and feel free to change the URL to a local one
instead of a mozilla.org one. Thanks!

creator: jorton@redhat.com
text:
Submissions of less-fingered replacements would no doubt be gratefully
ignored^Wreceived; I doubt anyone will get out of bed to do this otherwise ;)
